settings.title: Precision Delivery System
settings.text: Unlike topical creams, our Microneedle Technology goes directly where it’s needed, deeper in the skin. Pyramid-shaped microneedles on perfect-fitting hydrocolloid patches ensure gentle, effective penetration and fast absorption of ingredients.

settings.title: Boosts Collagen Production
settings.text: Made with key peptides to stimulate the body’s natural collagen and elastin production, smoothing fine lines and wrinkles and boosting plumper, youthful-looking skin.

settings.title: Visible Improvement
settings.text: High performance formulation for visibly firmer, brighter, more hydrated skin. Visible improvements that get better with continued use.

settings.heading: Before and After
settings.review: Super simple to use and dramatic difference in pimple size overnight. Cannot live without these now!

I’ve recently discovered Microneedle pimple patches. I used them on an under the surface spot that was sore and painful but no head, just a red bump. The tiny needles penetrate the skin in and around the spot releasing the ingredients. I didn’t feel the needles and its completely painless. I left it on overnight and saw a visible difference in the size of my spot in the morning.

settings.text:
Crystallised serum

Our microneedles are in fact highly concentrated serums, crystallised. There is no oil involved, and only the absolute minimum of water. They deliver no filler, just killer ingredients.

Rooted in medicine

Microneedle patches were developed to deliver drugs and vaccines – we’ve changed the active ingredients to apply to skincare, but nothing else. This is medical-grade technology: evidence-based, precision-targeted, ultra-hygienic.

Perfect pyramid needles

Designed to cause no trauma, the elongated pyramid-shape of our microneedles allows them to painlessly push through skin’s outer layer to deliver the good stuff to the skin cell-producing epidermis.

Fast-melting

With all the ingredients dissolving into the deeper skin layers and getting to work from just two hours, you’ll notice results faster than you do with regular skincare.

For best results, we recommend using twice per week for two weeks, then weekly. Leave on for at least 2 hours to allow the microneedles to fully dissolve. 

Upon removal you should notice immediate hydrating and brightening effects and, after 4-6 weeks, visible improvement on fine lines. With continued use results will get better over time.

Can also be used as an occasional “SOS plump-up treatment” to give a revitalising, hydrating and brightening effect when you feel you need or deserve it.

To avoid potential sensitivity from the microneedles we recommend you do not use more than 3 times per week.

settings.title: Peptides
settings.text: Peptides are amino acids that trigger the body’s natural collagen production, known to improve the skin’s tightness, firmness and elasticity.

settings.title: Hyaluronic Acid
settings.text:
Helps the skin retain its moisture,
resulting in hydrated, nourished and plumper-looking skin.

settings.title: Vitamin C
settings.text: An antioxidant that restores damage and aids the cell regeneration process, while brightening and evening skin texture.

Creams and serums just don’t cut it anymore! They have to work hard just to get through the skin’s outer barrier layer to the epidermis, where they’re most needed.

High-performing but gentle on skin, our ultimate eye patches are formulated to soften fine lines, strengthen skin elasticity, boost hydration, and brighten the eye area.

Press down to activate and feel the tiny prickle which tells you the microneedles are getting straight to work beneath the skin surface. Each pair contains 2600 self-dissolving microneedles preloaded with our skin-restoring formula. Once applied, the needles self-dissolve releasing a burst of ingredients into the epidermis where they’re most needed to leave skin looking plumper, smoother and rejuvenated.

The needles contain a blend of high-performing active ingredients, known for their skin rejuvenating properties. Peptides work with your body’s natural collagen production to promote cell rejuvenation, visibly plumping skin for a youthful and renewed appearance. Hyaluronic acid provides deep hydration, leaving skin well-moisturised and nourished. Vitamin C and Glutathione work in unison brighten, smooth and restore skin, while balancing skin tone to reveal a radiant glow.


Designed to be gentle on the delicate eye area these easy to apply ultimate eye patches fit seamlessly into your routine with visible improvements over time which continue to get better with continued use.

After two hours the microneedles
self-dissolve releasing the ngredients into the dermal layers to purify from within, prevent bacteria from forming, reduce inflammation, moisturise, soothe and repair your skin.

settings.quote: THIS 'MIRACLE' PRODUCT COULD BE THE SOLUTION WE'RE ALL SEARCHING FOR.

settings.description: Describe the video for customers using screen readers

settings.text:
1.Cleanse and dry your face thoroughly. This will help the microneedles to attach properly to your skin.

2.Remove the thin plastic film from each eye mask – careful not to touch those magic microneedles in the centre.

3.Gently place onto the under-eye area and press the mask into skin to activate the microneedles. Do not rub.

4.Leave on for at least two hours, allowing your skin to absorb the ingredients. Remove and discard when done.

settings.heading: What are microneedles?
settings.content: Microneedles are – quite literally – microscopic needles made from crystallised serum of our skin-boosting ingredients. When the microneedles meet the skin the needles fully dissolve releasing the ingredients beneath the skin where they can be most effective delivering powerful and longer-lasting results.

settings.heading: Do the microneedles hurt?
settings.content:
No, microneedle patches are completely painless. Microneedles used in at-home procedures are much smaller than those used by dermatologists, making them safe and straightforward to use.

You may feel a slight sensation when you first press the patch onto the skin, followed by a warm tingle as the microneedles begin to dissolve.

settings.heading: Do the microneedles damage the skin?
settings.content: Absolutely not. Our microneedle patches use ultra-fine microscopic microneedles, which are designed to gently penetrate the skin resulting in no pain, damage or trauma.

settings.heading: Are the Eye Rejuvenator patches reusable?
settings.content: No, each patch is single use. Each microneedle is made from active ingredients crystalised into a serum. When the microneedles meet the skin the needles fully dissolve releasing the ingredients into the skin where they can be most effective.

settings.heading: Are the Eye Rejuvenator patches vegan?
settings.content: Yes, our Eye Rejuvenator patches are fully vegan. Our formula uses peptides to boost the skin’s natural collagen production, instead of collagen protein, which is mostly derived from animal sources.

settings.heading: Can I use Eye Rejuvenator patches with Filler or Botox?
settings.content: Absolutely. The Eye Rejuvenator patches gently penetrate the skin to allow active ingredients to reach the epidermis layers beneath the surface. Similarly, fillers are subcutaneous and are applied beneath the skin’s epidermis.

settings.heading: Will Eye Rejuvenator patches work on dark circles?
settings.content: Yes, our formula contains vitamin C, which is an antioxidant that fights free radicals in the skin, known to cause ageing, hyperpigmentation and dark circles. It brightens the skin while hyaluronic acid works to plump and hydrate the under-eye area.

settings.heading: Will Eye Rejuvenator patches help with under eye bags?
settings.content: No, the Eye Rejuvenator patches have unique properties, which are specifically designed to reduce fine lines and wrinkles. They are also formulated to hydrate and rejuvenate the skin, resulting in a plumper, smoother and youthful complexion.

settings.heading: When can I expect to see results?
settings.content: It differs for everyone, but you may start seeing results straight away. From one application you can expect to see deeper hydration around the eye area, but it may take between 6 - 8 applications to see significant results.

settings.heading: Are Eye Rejuvenator patches an alternative to Botox?
settings.content: Vice Reversa aims to hydrate, nourish and rejuvenate the skin from within, helping restore collagen and elastin for a brighter, hydrated complexion. The Eye Rejuvenator patches are not an alternative to Botox, but are effective in improving the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles with continued use.

settings.heading: How do I add Eye Rejuvenator patches to my skincare routine?
settings.content:
It’s easy to add our patches to any skincare routine, as they are simple to use and hassle-free. For best results, use twice weekly for the first fortnight, and then once a week from then on.

We always recommend applying the patches directly after cleansing to dry skin (before applying any serums or moisturisers). Once applied, you can carry on with your normal daily routine. It’s important to leave the patches on for at least two hours to give the microneedles time to fully dissolve.

settings.heading: How long do I have to wear Eye Rejuvenator patches for?
settings.content: The patches need to be worn for a minimum of two hours to allow the microneedles to dissolve and release all the active ingredients. They can also be worn overnight if preferred.
